abstract: An ambitious package of measures to combat air pollution and a summit meeting between President Obama and President Xi Jinping might have been overshadowed by Edward J. Snowden and his disclosures about the National Security Agency’s cyberactivities.
snippet: An ambitious package of measures to combat air pollution and a summit meeting between President Obama and President Xi Jinping might have been overshadowed by Edward J. Snowden and his disclosures about the National Security Agency’s cyberactiviti...
lead_paragraph: China’s State Council announced an ambitious package on Friday of 10 measures to combat air pollution. On Monday, Jun Ma, chief economist for greater China at Deutsche Bank and the author of the June 9 report “Big Bang Measures to Fight Air Pollution,” wrote in a note:

headline.main: In China, a Push for Cleaner Air
